# Problem 1

```{r}
n=10
x1=t(t(rep(1,n)))
x2=t(t(1:n))
x3=x2^2
x=matrix(c(x1,x2,x3),10,3)
p=ncol(x)
```

```{r}
xx=t(x)%*%x
xx1=solve(xx,t(x))
```


# Problem 2

```{r}
n=4
a=t(t(rep(.25,n)))
b=t(t(1:n))
y=t(t(c(10,11,7,15)))
x=matrix(c(a,b),4,2)
covm=matrix(c(6, 3, 2, 1, 3, 7, 3, 2, 2, 3, 8, 5, 1, 2, 5, 9),4,4)
```

```{r}
xx=t(x)%*%x
xy=t(x)%*%y
b=inv(xx)%*%t(x)%*%y
xb=x%*%b
r=y-xb
t(x)%*%r
```

```{r}
h=x%*%inv(xx)%*%t(x)
i=diag(1,4,4)
```

```{r}
e=(i-h)%*%y
ssq=t(e)%*%e
```
